name: DeadWoods (Joshua Kiley)
description:
You Have  Died

But Do You Remember Why?

Find The Truth In The Dead Woods

Seek The Car That Brought You Here Long Ago

And Let It All End

(Game will close on it's own when the game is completed)

Cover Image/icon for the game made by my friend @DevyanshiS07 on Twitter

(depending on your PC you may not be able to play the game using real time shadows)

Controls:

arrows or wasd to move

mouse to adjust camera

r to reset level

space to jump

ESC to exit game
